Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/96th
ShortDescription: Southbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 99th, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/96th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 99th, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/96th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
